name: Relayer Advanced - Stella Gear NEXT PACK
name_original: Relayer Advanced - Stella Gear NEXT PACK
description:
This is a special set of products that includes all of the following additional content.
＊The items included in the "Stella Gear NEXT Pack" can also be purchased separately. Please be careful not to purchase more than one item.
＊To use these contents, the full version of the main game (sold separately) is required. If you need to apply the latest patch, please update to the latest version before using this content.


■Stellar Gear NEXT" 9-unit set


【Items available】
・Astoria NEXT、Terra's battle data +
・Amaterasu NEXT、Sun's battle data +
・Petasos NEXT、Mercury's battle data +
・Herschel NEXT、Uranus's battle data +
・Galaxy Star NEXT、Milky Way's battle data +
・Comet NEXT、Halley 's battle data +
・Al-Jauza NEXT、Mintaka's battle data +
・Epsilon NEXT、Alnilam's battle data +
・Zeta NEXT、Alnitak's battle data +
